subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The U.C.I. said the investigations concern Australia’s Matthew White, Belgium’s Johan Bruyneel, Canada’s Michael Barry and France’s John Lelangue.
snippet: The U.C.I. said the investigations concern Australia’s Matthew White, Belgium’s Johan Bruyneel, Canada’s Michael Barry and France’s John Lelangue.
